sub_title: Managing Partner - Director Of Sales and Marketing Milanus Danışmanlık A.Ş. / Lea Olive Oil
summary:
Self motivated, results-focused professional with over seven years experience in purchasing and category management, demonstrating consistent achievement of objectives, leadership, accountability, and strong negotiation and communication skills to reach organizational goals.

Specialties: 
•	Contract Management
•	Project Management
•	Customer Relationships
•	Supplier Development
•	Global Business Experience
•	Managing and coaching skills
•	Category Management
•	Marketing Experience
•	Negotiation Skills
•	Team player
•	International Reporting
•	Food Safety and HSSE

school.name: Istanbul University, Institute of Business Administration
Istanbul University, Hasan Ali Yücel Faculty of Education

company.name: Milanus Danışmanlık A.Ş. / Lea Olive Oil

profile_positions.company: Milanus Danışmanlık A.Ş. / Lea Olive Oil
profile_positions.description:
As Lea's family, we believed that the most meaningful investment is made in nature. We presented our experience and labor to nature with ecological awareness. We set out to produce olive oil of the highest quality and purity.

•	Established brand equity: ensured right visual identity & on-pack claim, website and social media optimization for the Lea olive oil brand to meet customer, consumer & portfolio needs,
•	Developed a distribution channel for the products, sales channel through premium delicatessen stores, distributors and e-commerce to ensure correct brand positioning in achieving long and short-term sales targets,
•	Established marketing plans: promotional and pricing strategies, attending fairs and international competitions, distribution and shelf position optimization throughout the network
•	Implement continuous improvement plans and actions to ensure steady progress is made in capturing new global vendors, customer relations, private labeling, booking, tracking, and invoicing activities.
profile_positions.title: Director Of Sales Marketing

profile_positions.description:
•	Developed, led and executed purchasing strategies for 12 Mio $ goods per year. Crafted new negotiation strategies and closed better deals with optimal terms. 
•	Ensured a robust and competitive supply chain and product offers via supplier management & evaluations to support 1.900 sales points most of which are Fuel Stations.
•	Established %94 order fulfillment ratio for top seller products (%85 percent of total proceeds) with timely management of planning and monitoring inbound (Local and Imports) and outgoing deliveries, hence lowering the fuel cost with effective delivery schedule and lowering stock turnover ratio by better stock/warehouse management.
•	Provide effective leadership in all the categories: pricing strategy, service quality, customer satisfaction, financial targets, customer segmentation, driving ongoing value, continuous improvement to increase B2B and B2C sales.
•	Implemented E-Commerce strategies; Google Analytics 360 (Enhanced Ecommerce), Multichannel Sales Integration, developing new Marketplaces, fast shipment projects,
profile_positions.title: Director Of Purchasing

profile_positions.location: Egs Business Park World Trade Center B2 Block No:12 10th Floor Yesikkoy / Istanbul
profile_positions.description:
•	Established a robust and sustainable Non Fuel business in Alpet Turkey. N. Cyprus and Albania, generated 200K $ net income over service and product sales (including format sales) throughout the Alpet operated countries,
•	Implemented new “Gold” Shop - Wc format in 32 stations and “Gold” Car wash in 8 months that increased fuel, shop and service sales with better customer experience, that creates extra value for dealers and brand,
•	Started a digital transformation project over IBOS ( Digital Dealer Operating System) B2B Sales via e-commerce for dealers to easy access to product and services (Convenience Retail products, Lubricants, Adblue, Tank cleaning service, etc) that creates a huge opportunity for rapid growth, increase the product offer and receive customer information for better communication, 
•	Led E-Station rollout project (E-Charge corners) to increase sales by planning, designing and implementing the best solutions we can offer to local EV drivers.
•	Implemented private label quality car care and self-service washing liquid products, to increase profitability and catch customer needs with lower prices with better margins for the dealers, conducted several campaigns to increase sales, (nearly 200K $ product sales)
profile_positions.title: Non Fuel Sales and Business Development Manager

profile_positions.company: Türkiye Petrolleri - TP Petrol Dağıtım A.Ş.
profile_positions.description:
•	Developed and started to implement 300K $ net income Non-Oil Business strategy (while the company continue to proceed in joint venture between Turkuaz Petrol and TP), generated over 500K $ income and surpassed yearly targets,
•	Implemented 96 Nescafe coffee corners in retail-focused stations (Highway and city centers), 
•	Started a project with Koalay.com (Telesure) to sell insurance policies (Traffic, Automobile, and travel insurance) over TP Application, Web Page, and dealer shops in order to increase customer satisfaction and application usage, also towing for female customers were planned for additional service offer,
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
Full responsibility for convenience retailing activities in Lukoil Turkey, Azerbaijan and Georgia by managing 30 company operated site shops with purchasing volume of 15 million dollars annual product and service budget, and generating 200K dollars income over the dealer network (605 dealers) through service and good agreements. ( Umbrella agreements, Product of the Month activities, dealer value proposition)
*  Implemented new shop format in order to increase  merchandising, over 60 shops were renewed, 3rd country in the world with new shop format.
* "Dealer Club Project" started to leverage global experience and network power to dealers; 
 that has guaranteed basic service standards at Lukoil MINIMARKET's, ıncreased dealer contribution to promotions and reduced costs for the dealers
* Developed E-Training Modules, ( Operational Excellence/Basic Service Steps – HSSE – Shop Operation, Active Sales, Merchandising)
profile_positions.title: Non Fuel Retail Manager

profile_positions.description:
Full responsibility for convenience retailing activities in Turkey, by managing 10 company owned site shops with purchasing volume of 8,4 million dolar annual products and service budget, and generated 900K dollars income over  the dealer network (over 1.000 dealers) through service and good agreements. Maintained alliance with global and cluster CR strategy and imroved CR offer in order to increase customer satisfaction, Selected Accomplishments:
•	Lead project to increase CR contribution to Shell Retail Turkey in reaching global 2015 targets by developing an attractive, robust PVP offer which will bring fundamental value for CR and generate 2,8 million dollars income for the business,
•	Increased CR profitability 20% to 1,9 million dollars per year,
•	Implemented successful Lipton tea fuel promotion which lead to %5 sales increase, hence  375K dollars benefit were achieved over the final offer,
•	Implemented new shop format in order to increase C-Store merchandising, over 400 shops were renewed, 9 IDO ticket sales offices, several ATM’s and digital signage screens were placed in order to increase customer offer and satisfaction
•	Lead first integrated cross promotion with Club Smart Card (Loyalty) and Sonax (CR supplier), 7.000 vehicles benefited from this campaign,
•	Lead an international project for car care products ( Coolant – Screenwash – Adblue ) and its procurement strategy, business model and business continuity in Turkey which will create 1 million dollars C3 yearly, despite the exit strategy on global level,
•	Implement first food safety guide and training programme in network, delivered training to  over 500 dealers site manager and site staff and all sales staff,
profile_positions.title: Convenience Retail Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible of Le Pain Quotidien brand and its cost control, prepared monthly and quarterly reports over stocks and cost margins. Maintained relations with local and international suppliers. Supplier assessment and qualification process were conducted to ensure quality supply, Managed inventory levels and ordered or imported economical quantities for all private label retail food and non-food products, Selected Accomplishments:
•	Reduced total food costs by 15% with supplier assessment systematic and classifying suppliers with supplier pyramid,
•	Better stock and order management increased customer satisfaction and sales by 6% reduced wastage increased the efficiency.
profile_positions.title: Purchasing Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for 50 million dollars purchasing, dairy products category in central delicatessen. Prepared scenarios and action plans within categories to reach revenue and profit margins, took full responsiblity for renewing yearly agreements. Managed stocks and stock movements in İstanbul, Ankara, İzmir, Adana ve Antalya regions. Improved relations with suppliers, and organized special activities to reach sales objectives, Planned daily / fortnightly, weekly, catalouge and store-opening promotions, Arranged ideal selling prices according to target margins and price analyses for price index products. Selected Accomplishments:
•	Increased sales by 9,96% and profitability by 1,5% within categories,
•	Achieved 94% delivery ratio in all warehouses,
•	Successfully implemented planograms for different dimensions of delicatessen department to extend product visibility, stock management and sales.
profile_positions.title: Retail Purchasing Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Responsible of three categories; Margarine, Frozen Food, Eggs. Effectively managed stocks and stock movements in İstanbul, Ankara, İzmir regions, Maintained relations with suppliers, and organized activities to reach sales objectives. Planned daily / fortnightly and store-opening promotions. Arranged ideal selling prices according to target margins and price analyses. Designed and controlled shelves of the stores, Selected Accomplishments:
•	Increased sales 16,4 percent and profitability 2,7 percent within the categories ,
•	Implemented the first ever Egg catalouge promotion with record delivery ratio of 99% in all regions ,
profile_positions.title: Purchasing Specialist

profile_positions.description: Gained new customers and designed IT based solutions for their software and hardware needs. Participated in exhibitions and shaped marketing strategy to ensure reaching sales targets.
profile_positions.title: Partner Owner
